Desc.entry: A scheme managed by Yorkshire Housing Foundation for all people aged 70 years and over living in owner-occupied houses, council accommodation or privately rented housing. Smoke alarms, small equipment and adaptations, for example non-slip bath mats, grab handles, are provided to vulnerable people. There will be a contribution to make towards the cost of the equipment. Benefits check and advice on grants and services available. Self or any referral. Company limited by guarantee no 2574084.
